verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G4442>fire:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them that had gotten the <S%G3528>victory<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1504>image,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5480>mark,<s%> and <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
